page.title: 04Interview of a Vicar.
page.content: Mr. Martin is vicar of five parishes. We interviewed Mr Martin in the small church in Upleadon. The church itself has expanded from an old Norman building with some Saxon parts dating from the C9 or C10.The church has many visitors and a wide range of services with 10 to 25+ people attending. Upleadon has a population of 200, all of whom have goodwill to the building. { What are the problems of running {five parishes?}The major factor is sharing time equally between the parishes.Another problem is the upkeep of the buildings.The five churches are continually needing repairs leaving the churches in debt.For example this church was closed and declared unsafe. The cost of repairs was Â£11,000. Although we are helped by a church group some money still has to come from charity.
